attributes.additional_details: A London Assembly member stated, “The government’s plans to revoke free travel for under-18s in our capital is nothing short of an attack on our children and they need to be urgently taken off the table”. As a young adult, I know how this’ll affect those around me. This is unjust and unfair, especially to those families claiming Universal Credit and other related benefits.
attributes.background: Under 18s have free travel on TfL Services (excluding Trains, Thameslink etc.). Free travel for Under 18s wil be scrapped as part of the Governments £1.6 billion bailout of Transport for London (TfL).
